bibl.title: Kontonaitor: a Ghost Word.
bibl.note: The read on kontonaitor in line 21 of S.B. I, 5175 [ed.: A.-H. Sayce, REG 3 (1890) pp. 136-138; now at University College, London] is wrong: one should read instead kontoukor, a Greek transliteration of the Latin conductor. The word applies to the contractor for the cursus uelox, the postal service.
Schubert Paul, Kontonaitor: a Ghost Word.
